snippet.title: Gloom and Doom - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Gloom and Doom is a visual novel throwback to 90s slacker movies, but with a supernatural twist. Push a powerful but unmotivated slacker wraith to complete his stagnated quest to enter heaven, while trying to kill the suicidal but also unkillable Doom Bringer. 

Gloom and Doom is now available for PC via Steam.
